Closing because the offending class no longer exists (due to refactoring). Out 
of curiosity, did you get a later build and then go back to the older build. 
Doing that would cause this problem.
Yes, you are right. I've installed new version, see, that it can not find class java.lang.Object and go back. Of course this is bad way, I should backup workspace. Sorry about false bug report.
